org.gvsig.gui.beans.incrementabletask

Class IncrementableProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.gui.beans.incrementabletask.IncrementableProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, IIncrementable, IncrementableListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferSelectionProcess
    Deprecated. 
    use org.gvsig.tools.task.AbstractMonitorableTask http://blog.gvsig.org/2012/08/07/hilos-y-gvsig-1

    public abstract class IncrementableProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements IIncrementable, IncrementableListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Process to be executed by an IncrementableTask.

                            java.lang.String label,
                            boolean cancellable,

        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new process.
        Parameters:
        title - title for the dialog that displays the evolution of the process
        label - brief of this process, that will be displayed in the dialog
        cancellable - determines if this process can be canceled
        pausable - determines if this process can be paused
